0.0.4.en: This update adds grocery list products to the list widget.

0.0.6.en: This update implements adding items from the widget.

0.0.8.en: This update syncs the dutch translations.

0.0.9.en: This update adds the ability to categorize products in the grocery list and adds a flow card to remove all completed items.

0.0.10.en: This update finalizes the project structure and represents the mvp version.

0.0.11.en: This update fixes some small issues in the widget and changes the brand color.

0.1.0.en: This update introduces editing list items from the widget and adds a swipe to remove feature.
